0.speaker: Bellora Truscott
0.text: Beautiful day, isn't it? Do make the most of it. You never know how many you've got left.
0.context: NodeContext: sadly, to herself (talking about a child who's no longer alive)

1.speaker: Bellora Truscott
1.text: This was always her favourite season. What I'd give to feed the ducks with her again.
1.context: NodeContext: sadly, to herself (talking about a child who's no longer alive)
